Name: Snowman Arena
About the game: Snowman Arena creates a space for closeness, shared moments and fun you'll happily remember. And tons of explosions of course. Key Features local multiplayer for up to 4 players on-line game with friends using Steam Remote Play World Leaderboard in singleplayer highscore mode up to 3 players on one keyboard gamepads support bots adjustable difficulty for each player to balance gameplay so everyone can enjoy the game two movement styles 8 maps 5 projectiles and 5 power-ups Game Modes Deathmatch Team Deathmatch Last Man Standing Highscore
